GSP30pratyabu:384: upakrāntaṃ puryaṣṭakam eva parāmraṣṭavyam na tu yathā vivaraṇakṛtaḥ ekatra sūkṣme sthūle śarīre vā iti vyākṛtavantaḥ |
GSP30pratyabu:385: stutaṃ ca mayā svatantraś citicakrāṇāṃ cakravartī maheśvaraḥ |
GSP30pratyabu:388: yat etāvat uktaprakaraṇaśarīraṃ tat sarvaṃ śivaṃ śivaprāptihetutvāt śivāt prasṛtatvāt śivasvarūpābhinnatvāc ca śivamayam eva iti śivam |
GSP30pratyabu:389: dehaprāṇasukhādibhiḥ pratikalaṃ saṃrudhyamāno janaḥ pūrṇānandaghanām imāṃ na cinute māheśvarīṃ svāṃ citim |
GSP30pratyabu:390: madhyebodhasudhābdhi viśvam abhitas tatphenapiṇḍopamaṃ yaḥ paśyed upadeśatas tu kathitaḥ sākṣāt sa ekaḥ śivaḥ ||
GSP30pratyabu:391: yeṣāṃ vṛttaḥ śāṅkaraḥ śaktipāto ye 'nabhyāsāt tīkṣṇayuktiṣv ayogyāḥ |
GSP30pratyabu:392: śaktā jñātuṃ neśvarapratyabhijñām uktas teṣām eṣa tattvopadeśaḥ ||
